name: Breathe Fire
desc: Unleashes a breath of fire in front of Dragon Knight that burns enemies and reduces the damage their attacks deal.

name: Illuminate
desc: Channels light energy, building power the longer it's channeled.  Once released, a wave is sent forth that deals damage and gives vision in its path.  The longer it is channeled, the more damage is dealt.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Berserker's Blood
desc: Huskar's injuries feed his power, giving increased attack speed and magic damage resistance based on missing health.

name: Reflection
desc: Terrorblade brings forth an invulnerable dark reflection of all nearby enemy heroes. Affected enemy heroes are slowed and attacked by their reflection.

name: Glaives of Wisdom
desc: Silencer enchants his glaives with his wisdom, dealing additional damage based on his Intelligence.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Chronosphere
desc: Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence and causes you to move very quickly inside it.  Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected.  Invisible units in the sphere will be revealed.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Rocket Flare
desc: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies and providing vision for 10 seconds.

name: Ice Armor
desc: Creates a shield around the target friendly unit or building, which adds armor and slows attacking units. Lasts 40 seconds.

name: Darkness
desc: Night Stalker smothers the sun and summons instant darkness, so that he might use his powers at their fullest. While Darkness is in effect, enemy heroes, units and wards have their vision range reduced. \n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Flak Cannon
desc: Gyrocopter's attacks hit all enemy units in an area around it for a limited number of attacks.  Only the main target of attacks will receive attack bonuses such as Critical Strike.  Lasts 15 seconds or until the attacks are used.
